body_content.explanation: An uncalibrated measuring instrument or other device has not had the controls checked or changed to make sure it is accurate:
examples: The touchpad is still uncalibrated and doesn't provide the pressure sensitive functions.

body_content.explanation: Uncalibrated numbers, dates, or other information are in the form they were collected and have not been changed to make them more accurate or standard:
examples: All the radiocarbon dates are given as conventional, uncalibrated ages.
